<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The pass uses branch profile data to assign hotness based section qualifiers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for the following types of static data:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Jump tables</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Constant pools (TODO)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Other module-internal data (TODO)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For the original RFC of this pass please see</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// https://discourse.llvm.org/t/rfc-profile-guided-static-data-partitioning/83744</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StaticDataSplitter::splitJumpTablesWithProfiles(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinejumptableinfo">MachineJumpTableInfo</a> &amp;MJTI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumChangedJumpTables = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Jump table could be used by either terminating instructions or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-terminating ones, so we walk all instructions and use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;MachineOperand::isJTI()&#96; to identify jump table operands.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Similarly, &#96;MachineOperand::isCPI()&#96; can identify constant pool usages</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the same loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> : MF) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.operands()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.isJTI())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> JTI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.getIndex();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is not a source block of jump table.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (JTI == -1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Hotness = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a59c007354dfad2f618a37e6efaf7cd9ba4194726ee334e1085d93e002837b73f0">MachineFunctionDataHotness::Hot</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Hotness is based on source basic block hotness.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: PSI APIs are about instruction hotness. Introduce API for data</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// access hotness.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PSI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/profilesummaryinfo/#a597b25ab8d0a79f855c6c66dc48cb803">isColdBlock</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>, MBFI))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Hotness = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a59c007354dfad2f618a37e6efaf7cd9ba1a3c2e99e572ec71d3820d0363d90742">MachineFunctionDataHotness::Cold</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MJTI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinejumptableinfo/#a8399f4d8dfa10432948d8da0ef0e6674">updateJumpTableEntryHotness</a>(JTI, Hotness))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ++NumChangedJumpTables;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumChangedJumpTables &gt; 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StaticDataSplitter::splitJumpTables(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!MJTI || MJTI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinejumptableinfo/#af9c60f4a0193375a5dd205fb945107a8">getJumpTables</a>().empty())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ProfileAvailable = PSI &amp;&amp; PSI-&gt;hasProfileSummary() &amp;&amp; MBFI &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> statOnExit = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1af45c4dc83c083c5ae914d96fd3ce96">llvm::make&#95;scope&#95;exit</a>(&#91;&amp;&#93; &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Hotness = MJTI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinejumptableinfo/#af9c60f4a0193375a5dd205fb945107a8">getJumpTables</a>()&#91;JTI&#93;.Hotness;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Hotness == MachineFunctionDataHotness::Hot) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Hotness == MachineFunctionDataHotness::Cold &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">               </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;A jump table is either hot or cold when profile information is &quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Place jump tables according to block hotness if function has profile data.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ProfileAvailable)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If function profile is unavailable (e.g., module not instrumented, or new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// code paths lacking samples), -static-data-default-hotness specifies the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// hotness.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> JTI = 0; JTI &lt; MJTI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinejumptableinfo/#af9c60f4a0193375a5dd205fb945107a8">getJumpTables</a>().<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a>(); JTI++)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#ad828deab7de3b5f4d03fac86e26adae9">getJumpTableInfo</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinejumptableinfo/#a8399f4d8dfa10432948d8da0ef0e6674">updateJumpTableEntryHotness</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">        JTI, <a href="#a5724fb13d79f5b64a503344b91eb169f">StaticDataDefaultHotness</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"></CodeLine>
